messages.title: WE NEED A BETTER DEAL FOR OUR CITY CENTRE
messages.content: Centres are said that our shopping centres are dying and Portsmouth Harbour is getting nowhere while rivals invest in their city centres.

messages.title: Protecting local jobs
messages.content: More ship repair work is a must to secure the future of Dockyard jobs.

messages.title: OUR HEALTH SERVICE NEEDS OUR CARE
messages.content: Portsmouth’s accident and emergency service is struggling, as the QA hospital says they are 'exceptionally busy with rising attendances.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stephen Morgan promises to be a powerful voice for a city centre growing rapidly. He underlines the importance of reviving city centres and competing with commercial rivals.
Morgan stresses the need to meet the housing demand in Portsmouth with not enough homes being built for people.
Acknowledges the challenges of Portsmouth’s emergency services and declares that the National Health Service needs care and attention.

mentions.candidate: I am here today at Commercial Road...
mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can only win here with your support.

issues.economy: More ship repair work is a must to secure the future of Dockyard jobs. Our city centre needs a powerful voice for growth.
issues.education: Labour wants to protect Portsmouth's schools.
issues.health: Our Health Service needs our care

housing.content: Portsmouth's housing needs are not being met. There are not enough homes being built for our people.

leaflet.personalStatement: In this first issue of Pompey Matters, Stephen Morgan shares with us why he's hoping to be our next MP for Portsmouth South.

contactInformation.address: Portsmouth Labour, 10 London Road, Portsmouth PO2 0LH

endorsements.endorsement: Stephen is exactly what this city and Buckland residents need.

quotes.text: I can honestly say I've never seen such a hard-working and dedicated local politician. You always put residents first.
Don't be fooled by Lib Dem, there is a choice in this election - Stephen is surely the best choice for Portsmouth South.

images.caption: Stephen on a visit to QA hospital

leaflet.additionalNotes: Pompey Matters - Standing up for you in Portsmouth South Issue 1
